sentence.Network_en: They will be inclined to side with essentialism and against nominalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们显然是站在本质主义一边而反对唯名主义.

sentence.Network_en: One, akin to nominalism and idealism , finds its expression today in finitism and intuitionism.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种类似于唯名论和观念说, 现在称为有穷论和直觉主义.

sentence.Network_en: The realism and nominalism of middle ages affected the traditional taxonomy with different modes.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要唯实论与唯名论以不同方式影响传统的生物分类原则.

这种学说，最近西洋的“唯名主义”（Nominalism）。唯名主义以为“名”不过是人造的空名，没有实体，故唯名论其实即是无名论。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French nominalisme, from nominal 'relating to names' (see nominal)

means.word_mean: 1. (philosophy) the doctrine that the various objects labeled by the same term have nothing in common but their name
